casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Delwood Earl SHELLY. No. 268P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Delwood Earl Shelly, Lillington, for Shelly, Delwood Earl. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of July 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
